moonslime.Luck.slots_copper.name: Copper Slot Machine
moonslime.Luck.slots_copper.description: Insert five copper bars and a battery to get back five to twenty random building materials.
moonslime.Luck.slots_gold.name: Gold Slot Machine
moonslime.Luck.slots_gold.description: Insert five gold bars and a battery to get one to five random items from the mines.
moonslime.Luck.slots_iridium.name: Iridium Slot Machine
moonslime.Luck.slots_iridium.description: Insert five iridium bars and a battery to get a random gemstone.
moonslime.Luck.slots_radioactive.name: Radioactive Slot Machine
moonslime.Luck.slots_radioactive.descrip: Insert five radioative bars and a battery to get back a random item people will love.
